meanings.definition: A vast number of people or things
meanings.sent1: There were legions of fans cheering for their favorite team at the stadium.
meanings.sent2: Legions of tourists flocked to the famous landmark to take pictures.
meanings.sent3: The legions of colorful balloons filled the sky during the festival.

meanings.sent5: The legions of books in the library seemed to stretch on forever.
